wro=
te:
>
> Hi... I was wondering if anyone here's watching the weekly 
Histori=
cal 
> dramas of NHK.  I've been watching them since my college days 
start=
ing 
> with th "Aoi" series.  Just a question, how accurate are they?  I've=
 
> been mostly intrigued with the "Toshiie to Matsu" series back in 
2002,=
 
> and I'm wondering if Hideyoshi and Toshiie were really that 
connected =

> as protrayed in the series.  (Obviously I'm a fan of the Sengoku 
Jidai)=

> Thanks...
>

I've watched quite a few of them. Most are based on noveliz=
ed 
historical fiction, so they are a mix of history, known or accepted 
my=
th, with added modern twists to interest the next generation and 
women in =
them.  Such things as Mori Motonari's dedication to Mii-no-
kata and sweari=
ng off concubines is pure fiction (from Mori Motonari), 
but tossed in to m=
ake it more date-friendly I suppose.
